word: “He shall build the temple of the Lord.” By his sacrifice and mediation, Christ is both the foundation and the builder of the church of God. The apostle Paul points to him as “the chief corner-stone; in whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto a holy temple in the Lord; in whom ye also,” he says, “are builded together for a habitation of God through the Spirit.” [Ephesians 2:20-22.]
